instructions: Resolve 16 lint/type errors reported by available tools.
Increase test coverage with more assertions.

PRIORITY: Increase test coverage to meet the target of 90%.
PRIORITY: Improve mutation score to meet the target of 50%.
Coverage: Add unit tests for all functions, especially those with complex logic or branches. Focus on functions that currently lack tests.
Coverage: Identify and cover edge cases for the main function in the class, particularly around input validation and error handling.
Coverage: Ensure that all branches in conditional statements are tested. Review lines with if-else conditions and add tests for both true and false cases.
Mutation: Create tests that specifically target edge cases and error conditions to increase the likelihood of killing mutants.
Mutation: Add tests that modify input parameters to test the boundaries of acceptable values, especially for functions with numerical calculations.
Mutation: Implement tests that simulate unexpected user behavior or invalid inputs to ensure robustness against mutations.
Quality: Resolve the 16 lint issues identified to improve code readability and maintainability.
Quality: Refactor the code to reduce complexity, possibly by breaking down larger functions into smaller, more manageable ones.
